title: Monday Post Show (11-1-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (11-1-21)
description:
Bobby on the new Real Housewives being announced. Bobby and Amy talk about their favorite Housewives franchises and are glad the new one will NOT be in Nashville. We also talk about Pete Davidson rumored to be dating Kim Kardashian. Bobby talks about being so tired on the way back from our iHeartCountry Festival that he had a crazy dream on the plane. We recap more behind the scenes of the festival that we didn’t get to during the radio show. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
